extensions:certificationExtension.name: Related Roller Coasters
extensions:certificationExtension.narrative:
Here are two roller coasters that will give you a similar experience to undergoing assessment for this badge.

* [Tempesto](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZCKhkRPq8rI), Busch Gardens, Williamsburg
* [Fantasia Mini Special Kiddie Roller Coaster](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bisz3CJZDpA), Tongdo Fantasia, South Korea
